title: Understanding Supply Chain Resilience for Beginners

context.prior_knowledge: Basic comprehension of economic concepts and awareness of simple supply chain structures
context.additional_context: Optimized for smartphone-based learning activities, featuring experiential learning centered on case analysis

learning_goals: Learners can explain the three core elements of supply chain resilience (human/relational/structural capital)
Learners can evaluate supply chain response strategies in crisis situations through real-world case analysis
Learners can develop step-by-step implementation plans to enhance supply chain resilience using learning tools

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
